subject: Re: Order #SSN1862, how did it go?
description_text:
i dont have the product yet

На вт, 15.07.2025 г. в 18:45 SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> написа:

> Hello Kamen, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel.
> Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes
> a few

conversations.body_text: Hi Kamen Krustev,    Sorry for the delay, we have noticed that your logistics updates are very slow and we will be pushing the logistics provider for you.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2518200706163281
